name: RealPlayer Visualization File
summary: Learn about .RPV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Visualizations are utilized by RealPlayer to give you a colorful display that responds to the audio signal of media clips you are playing. The visualization images appear in the "Now Playing" screen and in the video thumbnail.

You can access your visualizations by selecting View from the menu then clicking Choose Visualization. This will open the visualization submenu where you can customize the settings of a visualization, get more visualizations, and delete visualizations.
NOTE: The RPV file was last used in version 16 of RealPlayer.

description: Visualization file used by RealPlayer, an application used to stream Internet audio and video; contains information about a visualization such as the image and the settings for how it responds to sounds.
